metadata.name: IDV BattlePass #1
metadata.description: Issued by Ideaverse as NFT. This pass is to provide the Ideaverist (the supporters of IDV) with a one of its kind membership that will allow them to rightfully participate in the early forming of the community and studio development. Holders are entitled to benefits such as bonus or shares, or even given a head starts in the IDVâ€™s games.
